rows: A character triggers a {@trap collapsing roof|XDMG} trap (see chapter 3 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|XDMG}).
Two {@creature Cultist Fanatic|XMM|Cultist Fanatics} lurk out of sight to ambush the characters.
A {@creature Spy|XMM} pretends to be the cult's captive to infiltrate the party.
table.name: Cold Court
